extendedInfo.description: Diet Watchers Diary is the ultimate all in one WW Type app - Points Calculators + Built in Points list's + Diary management!Your friend is jealous since she got an iPhone New - for iPhone/iPad "Diet Watchers Diary" is kicking fat in the face!Application guide lines is that Mobile App should be simple, effective ,stable and fast we are here to help accomplish the really hard mission of losing that extra weight.â Points Calculators for Classic Plans (Flex & Momentum) and Plus / Pro methodsâ Points lists with several thousands of records which will continue to growLanguages with points lists:German (Classic & Pro)French (Classic & Pro & Pro 2.0)English (Classic & Pro /Plus)Dutch ( Classic & Pro )Spanish ( Classic & Pro)Portuguese ( Classic & Pro 2.0)â Light or Dark theme UI.â Meal \ Recipe Creator - define your meal using other food items .â Track various health recommendations on daily basis , such as liquids , healthy oils and more...You can add your own recommendations.â Mark your most common foods as Favorites and easily select those to deduct from your daily budget.â Nice and Snazy widget to enable you to make the most of your timeâ Weekly points management + automatic rollover.â Backup and restore application data.â Weight tracker with good looking charts to monitor your weight loss progress.â Daily Points Allowance calculators (For all systems supported)â Activity points calculator (by weight ,intensity and duration)â Share your personal favorites list with other Weight Watchers team members.If you have your own personal excel sheet with points list send it to me and I will convert it to the application format.â Export Daily Diary - including all the details, to mail as text file, HTML file to be used in the weekly meetings.â Email for support from Settings windowSearch "Diet Watchers Diary" on Facebook.Good luck on your diet!!!Formerly known as "Weight Watchers Diary" - App was renamed to resolve trademark claims by Weight Watchers Company.If you bought Weight Watchers Diary in the past - please email me after the repurchase and i will refund you for the old purchase.Disclaimer:Diet Watchers Diary is not a weight-loss program in and of itself, but a tool for you to use with a weight-loss program that you are already involved with. It does not provide you with all the intimate details of determining certain aspects of any weight-loss program. It assumes you are already involved with a weight-loss program.Please consult your health care provider for any health concerns.This application is not affiliated with nor endorsed by Weight Watchers Inc.Keywords:Weight Watchers Diary , Weight Watchers, ProPoints, PointsPlus , Flex, Momentum, WW

reviews.title: Just perfect
reviews.comment: Love this app. Helps me keep track without a lot of  effort.  Very easy to use.  Well worth the cost.
reviews.author: Kai\'a Taitano

reviews.title: NICE!
reviews.comment: Really great app that does what you want it to. Easy to learn, and does everything you need to track points easily.
reviews.author: Gail Bloom

reviews.title: Love this app!
reviews.comment: This app has been so easy to use i haven\'t had any problems with it so far! Love this app!
reviews.author: Christina Brady

reviews.comment: Great app! Really helps to loose weight and keep up. Would be nice if there can be a better way to edit diary list components. Right now measures cannot be changed. Also would be nice to have an option in the calc to calculate the relative part of an ingridient just by writing the points for certain amount. Love it!!!really worths.
reviews.author: LIAT CALFON

reviews.title: Best to keep me on track.
reviews.comment: I\'ve tried a number of food record apps; all were ok, but none kept me motivated. The count down of points & weekly bank are really useful. This app is super easy to navigate & doesn\'t take too much time. Overall a great app!
reviews.author: Kim Ellis

reviews.title: It\'s easy to use and a nice way to do ww without paying for ww!
reviews.comment: Love it, thanks!  Lost 7 lbs in 2 weeks.
reviews.author: Heather Huntington

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: It is so easy to work. I have a very busy schedule during the day and it fits perfect for me. I love it!
reviews.author: monica wood

reviews.comment: Love this app really helps track weightloss progress
reviews.author: valerie mcdonald

reviews.title: Excellent tool
reviews.comment: Great resource for ww without joining
reviews.author: kevin trackwell

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Saves me WW Membership and allows me to track.
reviews.author: JoEllyn Fountain

reviews.title: Very good
reviews.comment: Activity points are not as integrated or as prevalent as I would like but they do count
reviews.author: Peggy Van Sleen

reviews.comment: I love this app so easy to use and user-friendly
reviews.author: Teresa Carr

reviews.title: Well thought out!
reviews.comment: I love this app! It has helped me keep track of my points in a very easy way. Two thumbs up.
reviews.author: Marien Zambrano

reviews.title: Very handy
reviews.comment: Great app, easy to use, a little inaccurate with the actual programs but easily fixable, the developer is also quick to respond to email and quick to help fix glitches. Great customer service.
reviews.author: joe doss

reviews.title: Awesome and actually FUN!!!
reviews.comment: I LOVE this app!!!   It actually makes weight loss fun!  Ok, somewhat fun :).  So easy to enter the food you ate and see how many points you have left for the day, as well as the extra weekly points. I\'ve already lost weight after only 1.5 weeks!   I love that you can easily enter any exercise you do and see your daily point \"bank\" immediately increase.  SO MOTIVATING TO EXERCISE AND EARN MORE POINTS!!  :)
reviews.author: Rachael Sposito

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: I use this on a daily basis and it\'s exactly what I need for my free \"weight watchers\" program.  :)
reviews.author: Aleksa Lamothe
